article_title: US tells Israel to improve 'deconfliction' process.
sentence: Kirby  took  time  to  draw  attention  to  the  approximately  200  aid  workers  that  have  been  killed  since  7  October  in  Gaza  and  laid  the  responsibility  for  the  safety  of  aid  workers  in  the  region  with  the  Israeli  military.
